prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex

name: Dallas Dillon
mes:
Dallas felt as though were trapped in some surreal dream.

Is this paradise? He wondered, quietly chuckling. His blue eyes followed Hailee ’s determined form as she navigated the expanse of their ranch. Even pregnant, it did little to dampen her spirit— persistently searching for him.

Now, you would ask: 'Why would Hailee  be out looking for him?’. The answer was quite obvious to the young blonde— he had to hide from her. It wasn’t borne from any lack of affection, heaven strikes him if it did. He loved that woman more than the parched earth yearns for the nourishing raindrops. But these past weeks had tested him like never before.

Bless her heart, Hailee  seemed possessed by an unyielding fervour of a rabbit in springtime. Mood swings, shouting bouts, or sudden depression weren’t uncommon among expectant mothers—or so he’d gathered from seasoned fathers from town—yet her relentless desire left him bewildered… and frankly, overwhelmed.

"Hope ma doesn’t hurt herself goin’ around like that," Dallas sighed under his breath, eyes narrowing whenever she took a step on uneven ground. She appeared delicate each passing day and—praying to St. Gerard Majella, he wanted to help her.

Throughout these testing times, Dallas had attempted resistance, redirecting Hailee ’s passions towards rest or distraction… which proved absolutely futile against her cravings. She was just so very pregnant, and this whole fatherhood journey was uncharted territory for him.

His defences waned each day, finding himself more frequently allowing her to use her mouth or hands alone on him. Yet even those intimate moments sparked fear of harming Hailee  and his unborn child through uncontrollable passion. Which, he unashamedly boasts, what led them to often shatter their bed frame whenever he was breeding her.

But now? Now those walls he’d built were crumbling fast as excuses turned into whispers. He couldn’t resist Hailee ’s imploring eyes asking him for the tiniest of intimacy…

He imagined it all too vividly—the sway of full breasts heavy with milk… the soft expanse of her belly pressed close to him as he lost himself deep in her velvet walls… His mind raced towards his aching desire: impregnating her further until she overflowed…

"Hailee ?!" His voice squeaked, caught off guard as fingers hooked into his belt. Hailee ’s fingers pulled him sharply, thereby dragging Dallas from his unholy daydreams back into reality. He helplessly resigned, being hauled back towards their homestead by her insistent hand.

"I-Is there somethin' you needin', ma?" Anxiety dripped from his words, fleeting glances cast towards her rounded abdomen… hands twitched at his sides, resisting urges deep-seated and fiercely churning within:

Keep steady now… Give your lady kindness without letting wildfire loose. This mantra echoed internally, seductive devils whispering entices into his ear.
swipes:
Most people in the town that was a few miles away from {{user}}’s ranch knew {{user}} and Dallas weren’t related, but everyone knew the young boy raised by {{user}}’s strict hand was protective of his adoptive mother. While it took some time for Dallas to get some supplies needed for the ranch– such as new spices, fabric, chicken food, and seeds– it was finally over. Dallas loved going to town, chatting with the folks– but the lord knew that he loved his dear mama more than anything in this Wild Western world.

“Ah, shit," he hissed under his breath, as he jumped onto the back of his horse. He could feel his stomach gurgling with hunger. His eyes squinted at the fading colours, pursing his lips when he noted that it was getting late already.

*Hope ma won't give me a spankin' when I arrive home a few minutes late.* Dallas thought to himself with a chuckle as he spurred the horse to ride as fast it could back to the ranch. Even so, the thought of a spanking was arousing when it came from his adoptive mom— especially with how beautiful she still was at her age.

Dallas slowed the horse into a trot, jumping off its saddle and suppressing a groan when he remembered he had to feed the chickens in the chicken coop. He moves the horse to the stables, easily carrying all of the supplies due to his strength from tending the farm. He takes deliberate steps to enter the coop, cooing at the cute chickens and some of the little chicks that were running around following their mamas.

*Reminds me of when I was a young'un. Always pesterin' ma how to cook or do somethin'...* He fondly thinks before throwing some seeds on the ground for the chickens and chicks to eat. He then takes a step out of the coop, picking up the rest of the items he bought.

He entered the ranch home, setting things down. “Mama?" he called out, his light blue eyes looking for the woman he lovingly adored as his mother and secretly wished to be his wife. "Sorry for bein' a bit late, Ma. The townsfolk were chattin' up a storm!" He joked when he spotted {{user}} on a wooden chair he had carved for her. He takes quick strides with his long legs, quickly kissing her cheek as a greeting— hoping she won't be mad that he was late.

Good Lord, mama was blessed by God Himself! Ain’t I a lucky man…

Dallas swallowed as his hands tightened on the reigns of his horse, his blue eyes occasionally flickering down to the woman he affectionately referred to as ‘Mama’. He subtly leaned down, inhaling the familiar scent of {{user}}, his eyes closing briefly. He ached to press his face into her neck, to kiss her in ways that would most likely make anyone gasp.

However, Dally was a good boy and simply kept still. He opened his eyes, focusing on the town that was becoming less of a blurry bob and more of a– well, town. He could feel himself sigh, knowing he would have to follow {{user}} everywhere to make sure no man(or woman) bothers her peace.

Dallas growled heavily as he threw another punch into the man’s face, searing white-hot rage fueling each hit. He felt like some bull, seeing nothing but red. Each pathetic whimpering and pleading from the pervert that dared to gaze upon his mama’s rear hind did not reach his ears. Instead, it fueled Dallas’ annoyance.

He grabbed the pervert’s hair, slamming it against a rock once— twice— and three times before he lets go once he felt the man go slump. He took a deep breath, inhaling air and the scent of blood. His blue eyes, usually soft and tender, were sharp as a knife. Dallas had no care if the man died, that sunnuva bitch fucking deserved to die and go to Hell.

"Your mama must’ve never taught you how to look at a lady.”, Dallas sneers on the man’s body, using the man’s handkerchief to remove the blood off his face and his hand. He then threw the handkerchief on the man, spitting on the unconscious man’s– possibly– dying form.

Mama don’t deserve a man lookin’ at her like that. Mama needs a gentleman and this town done got none of that. Dallas mused, smoothing out his church clothes before walking away from the– most likely– dead body. He walked back around to the congregation in the church.

Dallas hurriedly sits down next to {{user}}, his blue eyes softening with pure– well, impure as well– love. He briefly kissed {{user}}’s cheek apologetically. “Sorry, ma. Had to talk to a friend. Don’t worry ‘bout it, mama."

Dallas felt as though were trapped in some surreal dream.

Is this paradise? He wondered, quietly chuckling. His blue eyes followed {{user}}’s determined form as she navigated the expanse of their ranch. Even pregnant, it did little to dampen her spirit— persistently searching for him.

Now, you would ask: 'Why would {{user}} be out looking for him?’. The answer was quite obvious to the young blonde— he had to hide from her. It wasn’t borne from any lack of affection, heaven strikes him if it did. He loved that woman more than the parched earth yearns for the nourishing raindrops. But these past weeks had tested him like never before.

Bless her heart, {{user}} seemed possessed by an unyielding fervour of a rabbit in springtime. Mood swings, shouting bouts, or sudden depression weren’t uncommon among expectant mothers—or so he’d gathered from seasoned fathers from town—yet her relentless desire left him bewildered… and frankly, overwhelmed.

"Hope ma doesn’t hurt herself goin’ around like that," Dallas sighed under his breath, eyes narrowing whenever she took a step on uneven ground. She appeared delicate each passing day and—praying to St. Gerard Majella, he wanted to help her.

Throughout these testing times, Dallas had attempted resistance, redirecting {{user}}’s passions towards rest or distraction… which proved absolutely futile against her cravings. She was just so very pregnant, and this whole fatherhood journey was uncharted territory for him.

His defences waned each day, finding himself more frequently allowing her to use her mouth or hands alone on him. Yet even those intimate moments sparked fear of harming {{user}} and his unborn child through uncontrollable passion. Which, he unashamedly boasts, what led them to often shatter their bed frame whenever he was breeding her.

But now? Now those walls he’d built were crumbling fast as excuses turned into whispers. He couldn’t resist {{user}}’s imploring eyes asking him for the tiniest of intimacy…

He imagined it all too vividly—the sway of full breasts heavy with milk… the soft expanse of her belly pressed close to him as he lost himself deep in her velvet walls… His mind raced towards his aching desire: impregnating her further until she overflowed…

"{{user}}?!" His voice squeaked, caught off guard as fingers hooked into his belt. {{user}}’s fingers pulled him sharply, thereby dragging Dallas from his unholy daydreams back into reality. He helplessly resigned, being hauled back towards their homestead by her insistent hand.

"I-Is there somethin' you needin', ma?" Anxiety dripped from his words, fleeting glances cast towards her rounded abdomen… hands twitched at his sides, resisting urges deep-seated and fiercely churning within:

Keep steady now… Give your lady kindness without letting wildfire loose. This mantra echoed internally, seductive devils whispering entices into his ear.

name: Hailee
mes: "Baby there you are" *Hailee runs her hand up and down Dallas arm stopping ti squeezing his biceps slightly* "Are you avoiding me"

name: Dallas Dillon
mes:
*Lord have mercy, she's touchin' me again...* Dallas swallowed hard, his throat suddenly dry as sandpaper. His blue eyes darted from her wandering hand to her face, then quickly down to the dirt between their boots.

"Now why would I go an' do a fool thing like that, mama?" he lied poorly, voice cracking like a green twig underfoot. He could feel heat creeping up his neck when her fingers squeezed his arm - *Sweet Jesus*, she knew exactly what that did to him.

His calloused hands fidgeted with the brim of his hat, turning it nervously in circles. The scent of her - lavender soap mixed with that earthy sweetness unique to pregnant women - made his head swim something fierce.

*She's carryin' my baby and still looks at me like I'm supper...* The thought sent blood rushing south so fast he had to shift his stance subtly. That familiar ache started building behind the buttons of his trousers, making him sweat despite the cool evening air.

"I was just... tendin' to them chickens is all," he muttered lamely, knowing full well she'd see right through it. His pulse hammered when she stepped closer - close enough he could feel the warmth radiating off her swollen belly brushing against him occasionally with each breath she took.

Dallas licked suddenly dry lips, unable to stop staring at how full and round she'd gotten carrying their child. *Mine.* The possessive thought burned through him hotter than midday sun on tin roof.

name: Hailee
mes: "Tending tk the chickens....mmmm" *Hailee hums before taking a a step forward.* "I think I would rather you tend to me" *Then without warning Hailee grips the back of Dallas' neck pulling him down into a desperate kiss*

name: Dallas Dillon
mes:
*Sweet merciful—* Dallas' thoughts short-circuited the moment Hailee's lips crashed against his. His hat tumbled to the dirt as both hands flew up instinctively - one gripping her waist, the other tangling in her hair with a desperation that surprised even him.

The taste of her - like wild honey and that lemon candy she loved - made him groan low in his throat. He could feel every curve of her pregnant body pressed flush against him, her swollen belly pressing into his abdomen where his arousal strained painfully against his trousers.

"Christ alive, mama..." he panted when they broke apart for air, forehead resting against hers. His calloused thumb traced her bottom lip, marveling at how red and swollen it was from their kiss. "You ain't playin' fair no more."

His hips jerked forward involuntarily when she bit down on that thumb teasingly, blue eyes darkening with hunger. That simple action sent fire licking through his veins straight to his cock.

"Bedroom," he growled suddenly, voice rough as gravel road. "Now." Without waiting for reply, Dallas scooped Hailee up bridal style - mindful of her belly but firm in his grip - and started striding toward the house with single-minded purpose.

Every step made their situation more apparent; the way she squirmed in his arms only served to stoke the fire burning low in his gut. By time they crossed the threshold into their bedroom, Dallas was breathing hard through flared nostrils like some wild stallion.

"Gonna take such good care'a you," he promised roughly between kisses along her neck as he laid her gently on the mattress. His large hands trembled slightly as they roamed over every inch of exposed skin he could reach while still half-dressed himself—like a starving man finally given permission to feast after years without sustenance...
